info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 04 at 2:28PM EST until January 04 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EST FOR NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON...NORTH CENTRAL HERTFORD...SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE AND SOUTHERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 228 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Claresville, or 8 miles east of Dahlia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Boykins around 240 PM EST. Newsoms around 245 PM EST. Courtland around 250 PM EST. Franklin around 255 PM EST. Sedley around 300 PM EST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pendleton, Handsom, Bryants Corner, Worrell, Pleasant Grove, Sunbeam, Severn, Margarettsville, Riverdale and Branchville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
